config.comments:
This Processor pulls the metadata info of the tables to be loaded to HDFS.
select * from edw_creig_config.edw_load_parameters where src_name='dhub'
This Processor used mysql_db_connection to connect to mysql
jdbc:mysql://zookeeper02.creighton.edu:3306/edw_creig_config
Will be Running at 11PM EveryDay

entry.value: select source_name ,subject_area_name,src_schema ,src_tbl_name, tgt_tbl_name from edw_creig_config.edw_load_parms where source_name='ban8'

entry.value: SELECT B.name building_name, A.location, group_concat(c.name SEPARATOR '-') calendars, A.name event_name, A.id event_id, A.description, A.allDay allday_event, A.startDate startdate, A.startTime starttime, A.status , A.endDate enddate, A.endTime endtime, A.contactName contactname, A.contactEmail contactemail, A.contactPhone contactphone from eventus.events A left join eventus.buildings B on A.buildingId = B.id left join eventus.event_calendars ec on ec.eventid=A.id left join eventus.calendars c on ec.calendarId=c.id where year(a.startDate) ='2017' and accessLevel='public' group by A.id

select [User ID] as netID, [First Names] as First_Name, [Last Name] as Last_Name, [Middle Initial] as Middle_Name, [User Group] as user_group, [Purse 1 Balance] as technolgy_grant_balance, [Purse 2 Balance] as tution_fees_balance, [Purse 3 Balance] as user_pays_balance, [Purse 1 Balance]+[Purse 2 Balance]+[Purse 3 Balance] as remaining_balance from Rpt_Users where [Active?]=1 and [User Group]='student'
